title: Executioner

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Choose a player each night and try to get them hanged.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- If you successfully hang your target, you will immediately torment a guilty or abstaining voter, dealing an Unstoppable Attack.
- If you do not choose a target, one will be chose at random.
- ~~If you successfully hang your target, you will walk away from the town in victory.~~

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Hang a target by any means necessary.
